You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesV V] > &vcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Vcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0412/index.htm U+00412].
  * `&vcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0432/index.htm U+00432].
